Vendors

Becoming a vendor/sponsor at Chow Down/ Street Kitchen Food Festival provides you with the opportunity to market your products/food and/or services to our participants in an exciting, and fun environment. We will provide you with a 10x10 space in a prime location at our event where you can post signage, hand out swag, and talk to thousands of people.
Below are a few of our vendor package options. However, we love working through trades and cross promotions. If you have something to offer in exchange for a vendor package (ex: Promotional support, etc.) please feel free to pitch the idea to us.

Vendor Options

Price

What you receive

Flyer Package

$100

Opportunity to bring your team and pass out flyers/coupons to all of our participants at the event or leave them with us to hand out at our check-in tables.

Marketing Package

$100

Logo and coupon placed on Event Guide (a perfect option if you cannot make the event).

Party Package

$300

Vendor booth space (10x10) on event day, logo on Event Guide, and DJ Shout Outs during the event.

VIP Package

$500

Vendor booth space (10x10) at event, PLUS one promotional vehicle. Logo on our Event Guide* and event website, as well as DJ Shout Outs during the event, 4 VIP Tickets
